attributes.action: Make Jediism an officially recognised religion within UK.
attributes.additional_details:
-www.becometheforce.com
-Census of 2001 more people claimed to be Jedi then Buddhist in the UK alone.
-In New Zealand census of 2001 more claimed to be Jedi then those who claimed to be Muslim and Hindi
attributes.background: In the UK alone over 500,000 people follow this new philosophy and yet it isn't officially recognised. In April 2015 Turkish students signed a petition to have a temple built on campus so the UK wouldn't be the only one.

rejection.details:
Petitions have to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure what you mean by "an officially recognised religion". There is no list of "official religions" kept by the Government.

You could start a new petition clearly setting out the action you would like to see happen.
